.class public auto ansi sealed RemoteCertificateValidationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: The delegate's argument contains any certificate errors returned by SSPI while authenticating the client or server. The value returned by the method invoked by this delegate determines whether the authentication is allowed to succeed.
This delegate is used with the class.

summary.para: Verifies the remote Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate used for authentication.
